channel.title: WarpSync on Zcash Warp Sync
channel.description: Recent content in WarpSync on Zcash Warp Sync

item.title: Purpose
item.description: The main purpose of a Light Wallet or any wallet for that matter is to provide: the capability to receive funds, the capability to send funds, and display the funds available In addition, Light Wallet should be less resource-demanding than regular wallets. In the past, the latter term has been used to refer to full nodes. Full node wallets download the entire blockchain and keep a fairly extensive representation of the data within.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Non-private coins make up the vast majority of wallets. Almost all cryptocurrency users rely on them. As a result, they have come to expect a certain level of functionality and speed.
